thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Monday, 22 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Rite Aid Provides Update On Sale Of Assets To Walgreens Boots Alliance

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Rite Aid Provides Update On Sale Of Assets To Walgreens Boots Alliance
text:
Jan 22 (Reuters) - Rite Aid Corp:
* RITE AID PROVIDES UPDATE ON SALE OF ASSETS TO WALGREENS BOOTS ALLIANCE
* RITE AID CORP - AS OF JANUARY 22, 2018, RITE AID HAS TRANSFERRED 625 STORES AND RELATED ASSETS TO WBA
* RITE AID CORP - ON TRACK TO COMPLETE TRANSFER OF STORES IN SPRING OF THIS YEAR
* RITE AID CORP - HAS RECEIVED CASH PROCEEDS OF $1.31 BILLION SO FAR, WHICH IT IS USING TO REPAY ALL OF ITS $970 MILLION OF OUTSTANDING SECURED LOANS Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
